main_definition: occasionally or at irregular intervals; not always, but occasionally.

meanings_and_examples.example: I sometimes go for a run in the morning.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not all of the time; on and off
meanings_and_examples.example: She is not always available, but I can reach her when she's online occasionally.

meanings_and_examples.definition: On some days or at certain times
meanings_and_examples.example: I sometimes eat breakfast outside during weekends.

meanings_and_examples.definition: At unspecified periods; now and then
meanings_and_examples.example: Sometimes, I like to treat myself to a movie after dinner.
